item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Also, If You Have Project16 In The File These is a folder called data look for the admin notepad put your name in that, then You Should Be Admin,or if you wish put it in the mod notpad,
hope this helps

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

um go to the character folder. Then look for your character’s name. open it and you should see “playerrights = 0” Just change the 0 to a “2” and your admin on your server. Except without the "

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Did you fix the name, and add in the send message? I’ll give you an example of one
sendQuest("@red@Owner is Imstronger, 8154);

Or something like that, just add it in to where the rest of the things uptop are, you might end up having to replace the pk points or something, but they can get other people to check theirs anyways, up to you. Or you can still find a TuT on how to make Owner’s see their crown.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Drunk Santa”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Shibby”))
playerRights = 3;*/

On that, change Drunk Santa to your own name, and erase the one with Shibby if you want, sometimes the crown won’t show for owner, only mod and admin, but if you actually want people to believe you, make the send message "owner is username.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling
item.dc:creator: @imstronger imstronger
item.description:
@imstronger wrote:

ok, i am trying to make myself an admin on my server… i am confused

i have this…

[code]/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“DragonShadowz”)) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Kh2”))
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Drunk Santa”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Shibby”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Blue”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Disturbed0ne"))
			{
				playerRights = 1;
			}
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("DarkShadowz"))
			{
				playerRights = 1;
			}

[/code]

when i compile it, the compiler closes… then i re-load it… run my server… i am not admin… any1 help me please?
